active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Enable or disable the Buckaroo module.
active.tooltip: Selecting 'No' will overrule all individual settings.

mode.label: Payment modus
mode.comment: ! Test transactions are registered in Payment plaza !
mode.tooltip: Buckaroo can support a seperate environment. Contact Buckaroo for the conditions.

digital_signature.label: Secret key
digital_signature.tooltip: The Secret Key can be retrieved in Payment Plaza under the configuration tab. For support contact Buckaroo.

key.label: (Merchant) key
key.tooltip: The (Merchant) Key can be retrieved in Payment Plaza under the profile tab. For support contact Buckaroo.

certificate_selection.label: Certificate file
certificate_selection.comment: Upload certificates at the certificate management tab.
certificate_selection.tooltip: The certificate can be retrieved in Payment Plaza under the profile tab. For support contact Buckaroo.

thumbprint.label: Certificate thumbprint
thumbprint.comment: The thumbprint and certificate should form a pair.
thumbprint.tooltip: The certificate thumbprint can be retrieved in Payment Plaza under the profile tab. For support contact Buckaroo.

payment_description.label: Transaction label
payment_description.comment: The transaction description in Payment Plaza.

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Enable or disable this payment method.

mode.label: Payment modus
mode.comment: ! Test transactions are registered in Payment plaza !

sort_order.label: Frontend sort order
sort_order.comment: Determines the sorting of payment methods.

payment_fee.label: Payment fee
payment_fee.comment: Fee for using this payment method.
payment_fee.tooltip: In order to use a set amount, please enter it as a number (i.e. 1.5). In order to use a percentage, please enter a number followed directly by the percentage sign (i.e. 5%).

payment_fee_label.label: Payment fee frontend label
payment_fee_label.tooltip: This label will be shown in all order overviews where this payment fee is used.

max_amount.label: Max order amount (in Base Currency)
max_amount.tooltip: The payment method show only for orders with an order amount smaller then the maximum amount.

min_amount.label: Min order amount (in Base Currency)
min_amount.tooltip: The payment method show only for orders with an order amount greater than the minimum amount.

order_status_success.label: Method specific success status
order_status_success.comment: Leave empty to use default 'success' status.
order_status_success.tooltip: To make a new status available it needs to be assigned to the correct state. See Magento documentation about state and status.

order_status_failed.label: Method specific failed status
order_status_failed.comment: Leave empty to use default 'failed' status.
order_status_failed.tooltip: To make a new status available it needs to be assigned to the correct state. See Magento documentation about state and status.

allowed_currencies.label: Allowed currencies
allowed_currencies.tooltip: Your contract with Buckaroo must allow for the selected currencies to be used with this payment method.

specificcountry.label: Payment from Specific Country
specificcountry.comment: Only available when set to 'specific countries'.

limit_by_ip.label: Display only for selected IP's
limit_by_ip.comment: Show method only to Magento set IP's.

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Enable or disable this payment method.

mode.label: Payment modus
mode.comment: ! Test transactions are registered in Payment plaza !

sort_order.label: Frontend sort order
sort_order.comment: Determines the sorting of payment methods.

payment_fee.comment: Fee for using this payment method.
payment_fee.tooltip: In order to use a set amount, please enter it as a number (i.e. 1.5). In order to use a percentage, please enter a number followed directly by the percentage sign (i.e. 5%).

payment_fee_label.label: Payment fee frontend label
payment_fee_label.tooltip: This label will be shown in all order overviews where this payment fee is used.

duedate.label: Number of days between order and invoice
duedate.tooltip: After invoicing the customer has 14 days before the payment reminder.

sendmail.label: Send payment email
sendmail.comment: Buckaroo sends an email to the customer with the payment procedures.
sendmail.tooltip: Set to 'No' leaves the customer uninformed on the payment obligations.

allowed_methods.label: Allowed payment methods
allowed_methods.comment: Select payment methods for settling paymentguarantee.

sellers_protection.label: Seller protection enabled
sellers_protection.comment: WARNING: Paypal Seller Protection requires additional configuration. Please read the documentation before proceding.

sellers_protection_eligible.label: Seller protection eligible
sellers_protection_eligible.comment: Seller protection for unauthorized payment and item not received

sellers_protection_itemnotreceived_eligi.label: Seller protection item not received
sellers_protection_itemnotreceived_eligi.comment: Seller protection for item not received

sellers_protection_ineligible.label: Seller protection ineligible
sellers_protection_ineligible.comment: Merchant is not protected by Seller Protection

mode.comment: ! Test transactions are registered in Payment plaza !

sort_order.label: Frontend sort order
sort_order.comment: Determines the sorting of payment methods.

send_mail.label: Send payment instruction email
send_mail.comment: Buckaroo sends an email to the customer with the payment procedures.
send_mail.tooltip: Set to 'No' the customer is informed once online.

due_date_transfer.label: Due date (in days)
due_date_transfer.comment: Specify the number of days the customer has to complete their payment before the first reminder e-mail will be sent by Buckaroo.

use_creditmanagement.label: Use credit management
use_creditmanagement.comment: Buckaroo sends payment reminders to the customer.
use_creditmanagement.tooltip: Contact Buckaroo before activating Credit Management. By default this is excluded in the contract.

due_date_invoice.label: Invoice delay (in days)
due_date_invoice.comment: Specify the amount of days before Buckaroo invoices the order and sends out the payment mail.

due_date.label: Due date (in days)
due_date.comment: Specify the number of days the customer has to complete their payment before the first reminder e-mail will be sent by Buckaroo.

reminder_level.label: Max reminder level
reminder_level.comment: Select the maximum reminder level buckaroo will use.

payment_fee_label.tooltip: This label will be shown in all order overviews where this payment fee is used.

max_amount.label: Max order amount (in Base Currency)
max_amount.tooltip: The payment method show only for orders with an order amount smaller then the maximum amount.

min_amount.label: Min order amount (in Base Currency)
min_amount.tooltip: The payment method show only for orders with an order amount greater than the minimum amount.

order_status_success.label: Method specific success status
order_status_success.comment: Leave empty to use default 'success' status.
order_status_success.tooltip: To make a new status available it needs to be assigned to the correct state. See Magento documentation about state and status.

order_status_failed.label: Method specific failed status
order_status_failed.comment: Leave empty to use default 'failed' status.
order_status_failed.tooltip: To make a new status available it needs to be assigned to the correct state. See Magento documentation about state and status.

allowed_currencies.label: Allowed currencies
allowed_currencies.tooltip: Your contract with Buckaroo must allow for the selected currencies to be used with this payment method.

specificcountry.label: Payment from Specific Country
specificcountry.comment: Only available when set to 'specific countries'.

limit_by_ip.label: Display only for selected IP's
limit_by_ip.comment: Show method only to Magento set IP's.

active.comment: Enable or disable this payment method.

mode.comment: ! Test transactions are registered in Payment plaza !

cards_allowed.label: Allowed giftcards
cards_allowed.comment: Select which giftcards are available to the customer
cards_allowed.tooltip: These options will be presented to the customer after Buckaroo has received the order. If left blank, the available options will be based on which Buckaroo payment options you have enabled.

send_mail.label: Send payment email
send_mail.comment: Buckaroo sends an email to the customer with the payment procedures.
send_mail.tooltip: Set to 'No' leaves the customer uninformed on the payment obligations.

payment_fee.label: Payment fee
payment_fee.comment: Fee for using this payment method.
payment_fee.tooltip: In order to use a set amount, please enter it as a number (i.e. 1.5). In order to use a percentage, please enter a number followed directly by the percentage sign (i.e. 5%).

active.comment: Enable or disable this payment method.

mode.label: Payment modus
mode.comment: ! Test transactions are registered in Payment plaza !

area.label: Use for Backend and/or Frontend
area.comment: Select where the paymentmethod will be available

sort_order.label: Frontend sort order
sort_order.comment: Determines the sorting of payment methods.

allowed_methods.label: Allowed payment methods
allowed_methods.comment: Select payment methods for settling paymentguarantee.

send_mail.label: Send payment email
send_mail.comment: Buckaroo sends an email to the customer with the payment procedures.
send_mail.tooltip: Set to 'No' leaves the customer uninformed on the payment obligations.

use_creditmanagement.label: Use credit management
use_creditmanagement.comment: Buckaroo sends payment reminders to the customer.
use_creditmanagement.tooltip: Contact Buckaroo before activating Credit Management. By default this is excluded in the contract.

due_date_invoice.label: Invoice delay (in days)
due_date_invoice.comment: Specify the amount of days before Buckaroo invoices the order and sends out the payment mail.

due_date.label: Due date (in days)
due_date.comment: Specify the number of days the customer has to complete their payment before the first reminder e-mail will be sent by Buckaroo.

reminder_level.label: Max reminder level
reminder_level.comment: Select the maximum reminder level buckaroo will use.

payment_fee.label: Payment fee
payment_fee.comment: Fee for using this payment method.
payment_fee.tooltip: In order to use a set amount, please enter it as a number (i.e. 1.5). In order to use a percentage, please enter a number followed directly by the percentage sign (i.e. 5%).

payment_fee_label.tooltip: This label will be shown in all order overviews where this payment fee is used.

max_amount.label: Max order amount (in Base Currency)
max_amount.tooltip: The payment method show only for orders with an order amount smaller then the maximum amount.

min_amount.label: Min order amount (in Base Currency)
min_amount.tooltip: The payment method show only for orders with an order amount greater than the minimum amount.

order_status_pendingpayment.comment: Leave empty to use default 'pending' status.
order_status_pendingpayment.tooltip: To make a new status available it needs to be assigned to the correct state. See Magento documentation about state and status.

order_status_success.comment: Leave empty to use default 'success' status.
order_status_success.tooltip: To make a new status available it needs to be assigned to the correct state. See Magento documentation about state and status.

order_status_pendingpayment.comment: Leave empty to use default 'pending' status.
order_status_pendingpayment.tooltip: To make a new status available it needs to be assigned to the correct state. See Magento documentation about state and status.

order_status_success.label: Method specific success status
order_status_success.comment: Leave empty to use default 'success' status.
order_status_success.tooltip: To make a new status available it needs to be assigned to the correct state. See Magento documentation about state and status.

order_status_failed.label: Method specific failed status
order_status_failed.comment: Leave empty to use default 'failed' status.
order_status_failed.tooltip: To make a new status available it needs to be assigned to the correct state. See Magento documentation about state and status.

allowed_currencies.label: Allowed currencies
allowed_currencies.tooltip: Your contract with Buckaroo must allow for the selected currencies to be used with this payment method.

specificcountry.label: Payment from Specific Country
specificcountry.comment: Only available when set to 'specific countries'.

limit_by_ip.label: Display only for selected IP's
limit_by_ip.comment: Show method only to Magento set IP's.

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Enable or disable refunding.
active.tooltip: Set to 'No' refunds must be done manualy in Payment Plaza.

allow_push.label: Push Payment Plaza refunds to Magento
allow_push.comment: Allow 2-way refunding from Magento and Payment Plaza.

certificate_name.label: Certificate label
certificate_name.comment: Enter a name for the certificate. This is purely administrative.

certificate_upload.label: Upload your Buckaroo private key certificate

buckaroofee_tax_class.label: Tax class for payment fee
buckaroofee_tax_class.comment: Select which tax class should be used for the Buckaroo Fee.
buckaroofee_tax_class.tooltip: Must be a 'high VAT' tax class.

order_status.label: New status
order_status.comment: This status will be given to new orders.

order_status_pendingpayment.label: Pending payment status
order_status_pendingpayment.comment: This status will be given to orders pending payment.

order_status_success.label: Payment success status
order_status_success.comment: This status will be given to orders paid.

order_status_failed.label: Payment failed status
order_status_failed.comment: This status will be given to unsuccessful orders.

invoice_mail.label: Send transactional invoice email
invoice_mail.comment: Send a mail after successful payment.

auto_invoice.label: Create invoice after success
auto_invoice.comment: If set to 'No' the order is not invoiced.

cancel_on_failed.label: 'Canceled' state on failed payment
cancel_on_failed.comment: Orders will stay open after failed payments.

debug_order_updates.label: Display Buckaroo updates on finalized orders

debug_email.label: Debug email
debug_email.comment: Transaction data send as raw data.

limit_by_ip.label: Display only for selected IP's
limit_by_ip.comment: Show module only for Magento set IP's.

manual_empty_cart.label: Forced empty shopping cart
manual_empty_cart.comment: Overrule settings to always empty related cart after payment.
